title: Elementary Teacher Capacity Development Course for Online Civic Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: For pre-service and in-service elementary teachers, practicing civic competency education methods via simulation/VR in online environments, with emphasis on strengthening instructional design skills using diverse media

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three educational design frameworks to strengthen civic competencies in e-learning environments.
Learners can develop and implement at least two citizen-participatory instructional models in VR simulation environments.
Learners can design and operate at least three digital media-based civic education assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
